summary: Structured-prefix slot factorization and prefix-only finetuning did not produce reliable evaluation gains in our runs; some pass@K metrics were flat-to-worse. This snapshot exists to document the direction and prevent repeated effort.
recommended_next_step: If revisiting, pre-register an eval protocol (choose step/hyperparams on a dev set, report once on eval2), and attach full dataset+checkpoint fingerprints for each run.
